mapper.select: SELECT BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq, BUSSTOPCATEGORY AS busStopCategory FROM BUSSTOP_CATEGORY WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} AND BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT = 'show'

SELECT BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopDetailCategorySeq, BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS busStopDetailCategoryName FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY WHERE BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopCategorySeq} AND BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT = 'show'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUSSCHEDULE (BUSTIME, COURSENAME, WEEKDAYS, BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ) VALUES (#{busTime}, #{courseName}, #{weekDays}, #{busStopDetailCategorySeq})
